title: Fed will buy short-term loans to try to ease flow of credit
text:
Morgantown, WV (26505)

Today

Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable..

Tonight

Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.
